LanguageData.OMC_Turret_TacticalTurret.label: OMC tactical turret
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_TacticalTurret.description: An automatic OMC Auto Pistol-equipped turret. It will stop functioning once its battery runs out.
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_TacticalTurret.comps.CompMech: This turret has a limited battery life. Once it runs out, it will stop working entirely.
LanguageData.OMC_Gun_TacticalTurret.label: Impaler MK-II Turret
LanguageData.OMC_Gun_TacticalTurret.description: Reconstructed OMC Auto Pistol for turrets.
